oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Concentrated Bovine Serum Globulin Protein as a Colostrum Replacement/ Supplement in Receiving Dairy Beef Calves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Haupert, J. C.
Arthington, J. D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bovine serum globulin protein
spray dried serum
colostral adjunct
passive immunity
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This experiment was run to show the effectiveness of utilizing spray dried bovine serum globulin protein (BGP) as an effective colostral adjunct for the attainment of passive immunity in receiving dairy beef calves less than 24 hours of age.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1996; 183
